mapper.select: SELECT A.APP_SR_ID, R.REL_SYS, R.SR_TITLE, R.REQ_DT, R.DUE_DT, A.RCP_STAT, R.SR_STAT FROM TB_SR_002MT A JOIN TB_SR_001MT R ON A.SR_ID = R.SR_ID WHERE A.DELT_YN = 'N' AND R.SR_STAT = 'OK'
SELECT A.SR_TYPE, A.WK_TYPE, A.TRG_ST_DT, A.TRG_END_DT, A.RCP_STAT, A.RVW_CONT, M.DEPT_ID, M.MEM_NM FROM TB_SR_002MT A JOIN TB_MB_001MT M ON A.FIRST_INPT_ID = M.MEM_NO WHERE A.APP_SR_ID = #{appSrId}

SELECT APP_SR_ID, SR_ID, SR_TITLE, REL_SYS, SYS_NM,SR_CONT, FIRST_INPT_ID, MEM_NM, INST_NM, REQ_DT, DUE_DT FROM ( SELECT APP_SR_ID, SR_ID, sr001mt.SR_TITLE, sr001mt.REL_SYS, CD_NM SYS_NM,SR_CONT, sr001mt.FIRST_INPT_ID, MEM_NM, INST_NM ,sr002mt.RCP_STAT, sr001mt.REQ_DT, sr001mt.DUE_DT FROM TB_SR_002MT sr002mt JOIN TB_SR_001MT sr001mt USING (SR_ID) JOIN TB_CD_MT cdmt ON sr001mt.REL_SYS = cdmt.CD_ID JOIN TB_MB_001MT mb001mt ON sr001mt.FIRST_INPT_ID = mb001mt.MEM_NO JOIN TB_IS_001MT is001mt ON mb001mt.INST_ID = is001mt.INST_ID ) WHERE APP_SR_ID = #{appSrId}
